00022 /**
00023  * @file   SnpClusterStore.h
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Tue Feb  2 11:05:21 2010
00026  * 
00027  * @brief Class for reading the posterior from snp
00028  * clustering. Currently supports only Axiom but goal is to support
00029  * all GTC Affymetrix Genotyping algorithms. Goal is to provide
00030  * relatively quick random access to snp posteriors for display in
00031  * cluster plots.
00032  * 
00033  */
00034 #ifndef SNPCLUSTERSTORE_H
00035 
00036 #include "label/snp.label.h"
00037 #include "chipstream/SnpModelDb.h"
00038 #include "chipstream/QuantLabelZ.h"
00039 
00040 #include <vector>
00041 #include <string>
00042 
00043 /**
00044  * Class for reading the posterior from snp clustering. Currently
00045  * supports only Axiom but goal is to support all GTC Affymetrix
00046  * Genotyping algorithms. Goal is to provide relatively quick random
00047  * access to snp posteriors for display in cluster plots.
00048  * 
00049  */
00050 class SnpClusterStore {
00051 
00052 public:
00053 
00054   /** Enum for types supported. */
00055   enum ClusterModelType {
00056     UNKNOWN,
00057     AXIOM
00058   };
00059 
00060   /** 
00061    * Constructor that will open up the hdf5 file supplied and index probe sets by position.
00062    *  
00063    * @param fileName - Name of the model file of interest (eg AxiomGT1.snp-posteriors.a5)
00064    * @param tmpFileName - Optional name of temp file to write if necessary.
00065    */
00066   SnpClusterStore(const std::string &fileName, const std::string &tmpName="");
00067   
00068   /**
00069    * Clean up
00070    */
00071   ~SnpClusterStore();
00072 
00073   /** 
00074    * Return true if the model exists for this snp probeset for this copynumber.
00075    * 
00076    * @param snpName - Name of snp probeset (eg AX-11088371)
00077    * @param copyNumber - Usually 2, but can be 1 for chr X snps in men or chrY snps in men
00078    * 
00079    * @return - true if there is a model available, false otherwise
00080    */
00081   bool snpClusterExists(const std::string &snpName, int copyNumber) const;
00082   
00083   /** 
00084    * Given the name of a snp probeset and the copynumber desired
00085    * return the cluster distributions in a snp_distribution
00086    * object. For example the Axiom SNP has copynumber 2 in women but
00087    * copynumber 1 in men. This may be extended to other duplications
00088    * and deletions in the future.
00089    * 
00090    * @param snpName - Name of snp probeset (eg AX-11088371)
00091    * @param copyNumber - Usually 2, but can be 1 for chr X snps in men or chrY snps in men
00092    * 
00093    * @return - object with cluster information filled in.
00094    */
00095   snp_distribution getSnpCluster(const std::string &snpName, int copyNumber) const;
00096 
00097   /** 
00098    * Get the values associated with a particular key in the header information.
00099    * 
00100    * @param key - Name of the value to search for.
00101    * @param values - Values associated with the key specified.
00102    */
00103   void getHeaderValue(const std::string &key, std::vector<std::string> &values) const;
00104   
00105 private:
00106 
00107     SnpModelDb m_SnpDb;
00108     std::string m_TmpFile;
00109     mutable snp_labeled_distribution m_DistCache;
00110 
00111 };
00112 
00113 #endif /* CLUSTER_STORE */
